'''1.14.2 Pre-Release 4''' is the fourth and final pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.14.2]], released on May 24, 2019,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-14-2-pre-release-1|Minecraft 1.14.2 Pre-Release 4|May 24, 2019}}</ref> which fixes a lighting issue and a bug with entity clipping.

1.14.2 Pre-Release 4 was reuploaded on May 27, 2019, to remove the [[splash]] text "Woo, minecraftforum!",<ref>[https://www.diffchecker.com/Z6LB24NV Difference between the splashes.txt of both the original and reupload] via DiffChecker.com</ref> because the forum announced they would be shutting down,<ref>{{link|url=https://www.minecraftforum.net/news/60727-important-minecraft-forum-archive-announcement|title=Important Minecraft Forum Announcement|website=[[Minecraft Forum]]|date=May 21, 2019}}</ref> although this announcement was later retracted.

== Changes ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''Lighting'''
* All light is now re-calculated the first time a world saved in a previous version is opened.

=== General ===
'''[[Splash]]es'''
* '''Re-upload:''' Removed "Woo, minecraftforum!" as the forum announced it would soon be shutting down.
